comment.author: 31303396@N05
comment._content: This appears to be an early Case combine pulled by Cat tractor rather than "haying" machinery.  Wind-rowed grain is picked up by a platform hidden by the tractor.  Grain is thrashed from the straw inside the combine.  Clean grain is released into bags in front of the man sitting on the right.  The bags slide down the chute to the ground.
